subject: Labor and Jobs
Football
Lockouts
Organized Labor
Arbitration, Conciliation and Mediation
lead_paragraph: As court-ordered mediation began Thursday, N.F.L. team owners and players saw the lockout, and other issues, in distinctly different ways.
snippet: As court-ordered mediation began Thursday, N.F.L. team owners and players saw the lockout, and other issues, in distinctly different ways.
